name: mantium
description: Mantium is an open-source, self-hosted note and idea organization tool. It features structured content editing, tagging, and search with a flexible block-based UI built for personal knowledge management.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Apply multiple tags to notes for cross-referencing and categorization

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find notes quickly by searching through titles, content, and tags

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write notes in Markdown with live preview and formatting options

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Create nested note collections and folders for logical organization

features.title: Link Between Notes
features.description: Create bidirectional links to connect related ideas and build knowledge graphs

features.title: Version History
features.description: Track changes to notes over time with the ability to view and restore previous versions

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Download notes in Markdown, HTML, or plain text formats for portability
